BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of social services to report on services and resources provided specific to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, questioning, intersex, gender non-conforming and non-binary residents of domestic violence emergency shelters
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of social services to report on services and resources provided specific to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, questioning, intersex, gender non-conforming and non-binary residents of domestic violence emergency shelters.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of social services to report on services and resources provided specific to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, questioning, intersex, gender non-conforming and non-binary residents of domestic violence emergency shelters
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of social services to report on services and resources provided specific to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, questioning, intersex, gender non-conforming and non-binary residents of domestic violence emergency shelters.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
